sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"意识到的"之意。
means: aware ：强调通过耳闻目睹或感觉而得到的信息，也指敏税的观察和推断。侧重感知，多与of一起用。
conscious ：指内心的感觉，强调深刻的心理活动。
sensible ：侧重通过直觉或理性感觉意识到某物的存在。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"明智的，合情合理的"之意。
means: rational ： 指有理性的，有思维推理能力，而不是凭感觉冲动从事。
reasonable ： 一般不十分着重推理的能力，而往往用来表示合乎情理、公正或务实。
sensible ： 一般指合乎常情、切合实际的行为与思想，侧重明白事理。

sentence.Network_en: You can improve your chances of profit by sensible planning.
sentence.Network_cn: 你可以通过合理计划来提高盈利的机会。

sentence.Network_en: Richard Dorrington was, in their eyes, a very sensible and reliable man.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他们眼中，理查德·多林顿是个非常可靠的明白人。

sentence.Network_en: His advice was always sensible and his energy unbounded.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的建议总是很明智，他的精力似乎永远也用不完。

形容人性格的词汇 ... selfless 无私的 sensible 明白事理的 sensitive 敏感的.
IMusicsX: Stefanie Sun ... 02. 我不爱( I Won't Love) 03. 懂事( Sensible) 04. 直来直往( Straight Forward).
明字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 明知故问〖 askwhileknowingtheanswer〗 明智〖 sagacious;sensible;wise〗 明珠〖 pearl〗.

list.abs: 专四高频词汇 - 豆丁网 ... sensitive to 对……敏感 sensible of 觉查到 sick of 厌恶,厌倦.
somesthesis 体觉somesthetic sensibility 本体感觉somethetic perception 体觉
aesthetic qualities 美学的特征aesthetic sensibility 美感aesthetic sociology 艺术社会学
建筑词汇英语翻译(O-T) ... sensation 感觉 sensible heat 显热 sensible heat load 显热负荷.
有许多学者在进相关的研究,譬如全球通监测网(Fluxnet) 是许多研究单位在全球各地测地表的可感热(Sensible heat)、水汽(Water vapor)和二氧化碳通 ,并研究地表.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (also in the sense 'perceptible by the senses'): from Old French, or from Latin sensibilis, from sensus (see sense)

entry.tran: (行为或决定)明智的，理智的，合理的
entry.def: Sensible actions or decisions are good because they are based on reasons rather than emotions.

example.ex: It might be sensible to get a solicitor...
example.tran: 也许应该请一个诉状律师。

example.ex: The sensible thing is to leave them alone.
example.tran: 别去管他们才是明智的。

entry.tran: (人)明智的，理智的，通情达理的
entry.def: Sensible people behave in a sensible way.

example.ex: She was a sensible girl and did not panic...
example.tran: 她是一个理智的女孩，没有惊慌失措。

example.ex: Oh come on, let's be sensible about this...
example.tran: 噢，得了吧，我们还是理智地对待此事吧。

entry.tran: (衣服、鞋子)耐用的，朴素而实用的
entry.def: Sensible shoes or clothes are practical and strong rather than fashionable and attractive.

example.ex: Wear loose clothing and sensible footwear.
example.tran: 穿上宽松的衣服和舒服的鞋子。

sentences.sentence: "the more sensible p{ enveloping(a), shrouding(a), concealing,& (concealing by enclosing or wrapping as if in something that is not solid
"hills concealed by shrouding mists") }arts of the skin"

means.word_mean: 3. acting with or showing thought and good sense;
4. marked by the exercise of good judgment or common sense in practical matters;
6. aware intuitively or intellectually of something sensed;

sentences.sentence: "I am sensible that the mention of such a circumstance may appear trifling"- Henry Hallam
"sensible that a good deal more is still to be done"- Edmund Burke

means.word_mean: 7. proceeding from good sense or judgment;

auth_sentence.content: How much sensible heat is in the molten core?
auth_sentence.res_content: How much sensible heat is in the molten core?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How much sensible heat is in the molten core?

auth_sentence.content: I think that would be the more sensible approach.
auth_sentence.res_content: I think that would be the more sensible approach.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I think that would be the more sensible approach.

auth_sentence.content: The only sensible thing to do was to leave.
auth_sentence.res_content: The only sensible thing to do was to leave.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The only sensible thing to do was to leave.

stems_affixes.word_buile: sens感觉+ibility具备……性质的→adj.感觉[力],敏感性

stems_affixes.value_cn: 明智的,达理的;可觉察的,明显的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sens感觉+ible能……的→能感觉的→明显的
sens感觉+itive……的→adj.[to]敏感的,易受伤害的;灵敏的
non不,无+sens感觉+e→无感觉,无意义

stems_affixes.value_cn: 感觉, 感情, 感动
stems_affixes.word_buile: sens感觉+ation表名词→n.感觉, 感情, 感动
sens感觉+e→n.感官;感觉;判断力;意义 v.觉得,意识到

stems_affixes.value_cn: 敏感, 灵敏[度], 灵敏性

stems_affixes.word_buile: sens感觉+e→n.感官;感觉;判断力;意义 v.觉得,意识到

Sentence.sentence: Hey, if you can't enjoy the music at a sensible volume, why not use earphones?
It is a sensible way of teaching.
Crucially, as they opened up their markets, they balanced market economy with sensible government direction.
A few sensible federal measures could put the country back on the right path

means.word_mean: 明智的, 合情理的, 切合实际的

sentences.en: That seems to be a sensible idea.
sentences.cn: 那似乎是个明智的主意。

sentences.en: It was very sensible of you to bring your umbrella.
There's been a sensible rise in temperature recently.
Are you sensible of the dangers of your position?
sentences.cn: 你觉察到你处境中的危险了吗?

jushi.english: We'll be doing a lot of walking, so you'd better bring some sensible shoes with you.
jushi.chinese: 我们要走很多路,你最好随身带上几双实用的轻便鞋。

jushi.english: That seems to be a sensible idea.
jushi.chinese: 那似乎是个明智的主意。

jushi.english: There's been a sensible rise in temperature recently.
